CDEEEEB8F8304621B7E362B207DA3B73.description:
Examine cross-cultural similarities and differences in the products to
understand perspectives of the target culture(s) in the three modes at the
intermediate-high range.

0966C3AB2C484DE88CCAAAA72D3E0608.description:
Examine cross-cultural similarities and differences in the practices to
understand perspectives of the target culture(s) in the three modes at the
intermediate-high range.

02A27F1A55C64D7BBD3DE03867B04230.description: Analyze the significance of the similarities and differences between the target culture(s) and the student’s own culture.

C32ED8F358BC49F7A784047EF57AE08B.description:
Compare differences in formal and informal requirements for language
between the target language and their language in the three modes at the
intermediate-high range.

D25C55C247A8491CB819BC4BFB577F7E.description:
Use knowledge of sound and writing systems in the target language to
better understand their own language in the three modes at the
intermediate-high range.

656075D8E13C490092D4AEA63A6772A6.description:
Recognize how different time frames are expressed in the target language
in the three modes at the intermediate-high range.

AD91F866C70847608A11364C45B6D8C6.description:
Use appropriate idiomatic expressions in limited settings in the three
modes at the intermediate-high range.

4A431B915BB341CA8FC2130DBF90F406.description:
Compare similarities and differences in the target language and the
student’s own language in the three modes at the intermediate-high range.

966253C0919D459385B03EC03D0349C2.description: Analyze the significance of the similarities and differences between the target language and the student’s own language.

5EE4B9F54D8F43629954635845999857.description:
Comparisons: Develop insight into the nature of
language and culture in order to interact with cultural competence.

BC2B56EA587843B0B1213AC143EE862F.description:
Use authentic sources to explore the distinctive perspectives of the target
language and its cultures in the three modes at the intermediate-high
range.

EDFBD89CE06B41A2B8775E80E2050ECF.description:
Research authentic target language sources, analyze the content, and
acquire unique information available only through the target language and
its cultures when using the three modes at the intermediate-high range.

F827802FB55E468997CC462D8FA8D763.description: Make inferences using information and viewpoints present in authentic resources.

EB2C7C4CAAE9482AA2D53F48329BC410.description:
Apply information gathered through target language resources to other
content areas in order to supplement learning in the three modes at the
intermediate-high range.

F74437D8B78646C29CA316B769E51310.description:
Transfer and apply information and skills from other content areas to
experiences related to the target language and its cultures in the three
modes at the intermediate-high range.

38097D2F71FE41C2A27E28B51704596F.description: Make inferences using information gathered from target language resources connected to other content areas.

AEE8EAAB02B442D687DE5AB8F970FF70.description:
Connections: Connect with other disciplines and
acquire information and diverse perspectives in order to use the language
to function in academic and career-related situations.

DB1081B89A9341DAAA31945EAF5EB1C2.description:
Interact with others in and from another culture at a functional level in
some familiar contexts when using the target language in the three modes
at the intermediate-high range.

EE48D35A499746CFAEC83307F587BBD2.description:
Recognize that significant differences in behaviors exist among cultures, use
appropriate learned behaviors and avoid major social blunders when using
the target language in the three modes at the intermediate-high range.

5EDD71760C774A06AA0C2EA0244ABC60.description:
Converse with peers from the target cultures in familiar situations at school,
work, or play and show interest in basic cultural similarities and differences
when using the target language in the three modes at the intermediate-high range.

545C51A9AFBD409DBF36FBFFFEC426F2.description:
Compare products related to everyday life and personal interests or studies
when using the target language in the three modes at the intermediate-high range.

79C765F533DC480BACADFF2B489852B5.description: Interpret and compare products to help understand perspectives in the target cultures and the student’s own.

4365E5ACF4584B23B0703808A7A2F521.description:
Interact with others in and from another culture at a functional level in
some familiar contexts when using the target language in the three modes
at the intermediate-high range.

400A9BEE2AC74549BCA1BA17204AB8A3.description:
Recognize that significant differences in behaviors exist among cultures, use
appropriate learned behaviors and avoid major social blunders when using
the target language in the three modes at the intermediate-high range.

76102002FCBE408390F7950C95113579.description:
Converse with peers from the target cultures in familiar situations at school,
work or play, and show interest in basic cultural similarities and differences
when using the target language in the three modes at the intermediate-high range.

2A90569FFD03498FB3A702971A639A81.description:
Compare practices related to everyday life and personal interests or studies
when using the target language in the three modes at the intermediate-high range.

E6A4F94F227B4DD59C5D923599A7ADF3.description: Interpret and compare practices to help understand perspectives in the target cultures and the student’s own.

4B40B67EF30046DDABEAB56CBC633405.description:
Cultures/Intercultural Communication:
Interact with cultural competence and understanding.

F68B0F0024254EF1AF56623373342435.description:
Give detailed presentations on a variety of familiar topics and some
concrete researched topics, using a few short paragraphs, often across
various time frames.

12AEDCA0B4BB440084841F8EB0CE7FBD.description:
State viewpoints on familiar or researched topics and provide reasons to
support them, using a few short paragraphs, often across various time
frames

3003076941E8405C915C97BFACEB1597.description:
Tell stories about school and community events and personal experiences,
using a few short paragraphs, often across various time frames.

BA91976462294D048417B73D346920BF.description:
Communicate information, make presentations and express thoughts about familiar topics, using sentences and series of connected
sentences through spoken, written or signed language (presentational mode).

770F5A10218F4268A039309027C1E892.description:
Usually understand the main idea and flow of events expressed in various
time frames in conversations, discussions and other sources.

D6E8ABFC2AFE476795C6786A01035BD6.description:
Usually follow the main story and actions expressed in various time frames
in paragraph-length fictional texts.

DCEFDD8BCCE24D9483F92CAF5BAD5C8D.description:
Usually follow the main message in various time frames in straightforward
and sometimes descriptive, paragraph-length informational texts.

C323F3CB62BC458E93BEA1D440C47B14.description:
Understand the main idea and some pieces of information on familiar topics from sentences and series of connected sentences within
texts that are spoken, written or signed (interpretive mode).

D200CF8C5D4E43E597830B897DA3C6E3.description:
Explain preferences, opinions and emotions and provide advice on a variety
of familiar and some concrete researched topics, using connected
sentences that may combine to form paragraphs and asking a variety of
questions, often across various time frames.

6EED39A91BC5475081763958AE57BF02.description:
Interact with others to meet needs in a variety of situations, sometimes
involving a complication, using connected sentences that may combine to
form paragraphs and asking a variety of questions, often across various
time frames.

E5D4612EC0A24922BB120A1E1459ABEE.description:
Exchange information in conversations and some discussions on a variety of
familiar and some concrete topics that have been researched, using
connected sentences that may combine to form paragraphs and asking a
variety of questions, often across various time frames.

C0B10FD71525434EB105BB7A026ABE8E.description:
Participate in spontaneous spoken, written or signed conversations on familiar topics, creating sentences and series of sentences to ask
and answer a variety of questions (interpersonal mode).

09A18E7C3DC64025A0789F5A903BB44F.description:
Communication: Communicate effectively in more than one
language in order to function in a variety of situations and for multiple purposes.
